title: cenni malai mannanin
sahitya:
cenni malai mannanin sEvark-koDi tAvik-kUva sannidhi senru avanE sharaNamenraDaindEn


anupallavi

  vanna mayil vAhanan vaLLi deivAnaiyuDan punnakai puriyumoru kaN koLLAk-kATSi tarum


caraNam    maNNulagam tanilE mAniDa janmam pUrva puNNiya phalanAgum uNmai aduvenrAlum
eNNilA vidam avar kaNNillAdavar pOl iDukkaN urum pOdu taDukkum aNNalAgum
